ygData.subject: RESTwiki fixed
ygData.msgSnippet: Ah, finally.  Apparently Python has some backwards compatibility issues.  MoinMoin 0.9 only works with Python 2.1, not 2.2. MB -- Mark Baker, CTO, Idokorro

Ah, finally.  Apparently Python has some backwards compatibility
issues.  MoinMoin 0.9 only works with Python 2.1, not 2.2.

MB
